title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?
speech: What is the index of the radical?
pacedSpeech: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.
speech: Since the radical index is  2 , it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to  0, .
pacedSpeech: , it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to   0,

title: Solving the Radicand
speech: Solve , 6 x minus 5, is greater than or equal to 0
pacedSpeech: Solve  , 6 x minus 5, is greater than or equal to 0

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Add $$5$$ to both sides of the inequality.
speech: Add  5  to both sides of the inequality.
pacedSpeech: to both sides of the inequality.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Divide both sides of the inequality by $$6$$. Then we get $$x$$ is greater than equal to $$\frac{5}{6}$$. We can write it in interval notation $$[\frac{5}{6},\infty)$$.
speech: Divide both sides of the inequality by  6 . Then we get  x  is greater than equal to  5 sixths . We can write it in interval notation , the closed open interval from 5 sixths to infinity .

is greater than equal to   5 sixths
. We can write it in interval notation  , the closed open interval from 5 sixths to infinity
